title: Weekend Wrap
abstract: If you want to do something fun this weekend but haven't been able to make plans, have a look here at our…
author: Rishani
content:
If you want to do something fun this weekend but haven't been able to make plans, have a look here at our recommendations for the weekend.




The LB Big Wheels Motor Show 2018 will showcase a diverse range of luxury sedans, SUVs, powerhouse jeeps, a collection of classic cars and even a range of supercars. Organized by the Vehicle Importers Association of Sri Lanka (VIASL) in association with LB Finance, the motor show looks to bring to life the dream wheels of motor enthusiasts around the island.

This month, witness Westlife's Brian McFadden and Boyzone's Keith Duffy as they share center-stage as the super group: BOYZLIFE!



The famous Open Mic Night hosted by the Rotaract Club of IIHE is back for the second time in a row! Come enjoy an evening featuring an open selection of artists and creatives.

Starting from 13
May, Jetwing Colombo Seven will become your personal retreat within the city. Your day of uninterrupted pampering includes:7.00 am Yoga-welcome drink (Aloe Vera, Kind Coconut) at the roof top. Breakfast buffet (Food for Instant Detox). Spa treatment –Full body message. Cup of tea or coffee.

Do you like brunch? Do you loooove board games? Then this TLC event is for you! Join us at Black Cat café on the 20th of May for some delicious brunch and fun games.
